statements: SELECT * FROM leaderboard;
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE high_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, SUM(high_score) AS total_score FROM leaderboard GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE high_score > 1000 ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY high_score ASC;
SELECT player_name, MAX(high_score) AS highest_score FROM leaderboard GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_players, AVG(high_score) AS average_score FROM leaderboard;
SELECT player_name, high_score, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY high_score DESC) AS player_rank FROM leaderboard;
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY high_score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_name, high_score, last_updated FROM leaderboard WHERE high_score > 100 ORDER BY last_updated ASC
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE player_name = 'Alice'
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE high_score > 500 ORDER BY player_name DESC
SELECT player_name, high_score, last_updated FROM leaderboard WHERE high_score > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT player_name, high_score, session_date FROM leaderboard l JOIN game_sessions g ON l.player_id = g.player_id WHERE g.score > 500 ORDER BY session_date ASC
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY player_name
SELECT player_name, high_score, session_date FROM leaderboard l LEFT JOIN game_sessions g ON l.player_id = g.player_id WHERE g.session_id IS NULL
SELECT player_name, high_score, session_date FROM leaderboard l RIGHT JOIN game_sessions g ON l.player_id = g.player_id WHERE l.player_id IS NULL ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT * FROM leaderboard
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE high_score > 100
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY high_score DESC
SELECT player_name, high_score, country FROM leaderboard INNER JOIN player_info ON leaderboard.player_id = player_info.player_id
SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY high_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE high_score > 100 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT MAX(high_score) AS highest_score, player_name FROM leaderboard
SELECT player_name, age FROM player_info WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT player_id, games_played, total_score FROM player_stats WHERE games_played >= 10 ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard;
SELECT * FROM game WHERE genre='Puzzle';
SELECT player_id, player_name, email FROM player ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE high_score > 500 ORDER BY high_score DESC;

SELECT player_name, game_name, score, date_played FROM player JOIN score_history ON player.player_id = score_history.player_id JOIN game ON score_history.game_id = game.game_id WHERE date_played >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE high_score > 100 ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM game WHERE genre = 'Racing' ORDER BY game_name ASC;

SELECT player_name, email, game_name, score FROM player JOIN score_history ON player.player_id = score_history.player_id JOIN game ON score_history.game_id = game.game_id WHERE date_played >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, high_score, date_played FROM leaderboard JOIN score_history ON leaderboard.player_id = score_history.player_id WHERE score > 500 ORDER BY date_played DESC;

SELECT player.player_name, game.game_name, score_history.score, score_history.date_played FROM player, game, score_history WHERE player.player_id = score_history.player_id AND game.game_id = score_history.game_id;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE high_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM player p JOIN game g ON p.player_id = g.game_id;
SELECT location_name, city FROM location WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM player JOIN game ON player.player_id = game.game_id;
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM leaderboard WHERE high_score > 100 ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT game_name, COUNT(*) FROM game GROUP BY game_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score, date_played FROM leaderboard AS l JOIN score_history AS sh ON l.player_id = sh.player_id AND l.game_id = sh.game_id ORDER BY date_played DESC, score DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, location_name FROM leaderboard AS l JOIN player AS p ON l.player_id = p.player_id JOIN game AS g ON l.game_id = g.game_id JOIN location AS loc ON loc.city = 'New York';

SELECT player_name, high_score, game_name, city FROM leaderboard AS l JOIN player AS p ON l.player_id = p.player_id JOIN game AS g ON l.game_id = g.game_id JOIN location AS loc ON loc.location_id = l.player_id WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY high_score DESC;
